params.name: min_p
params.description: Minimum token probability, which will be scaled by the probability of the most likely token. It must be avalue between 0 and 1. Typical values are in the 0.01-0.2 range, comparably selective as setting top_p inthe 0.99-0.8 range (use the opposite of normal top_p values).

params.name: filter_value
params.description: All filtered values will be set to this float value.

params.name: min_tokens_to_keep
params.description: Minimum number of tokens that cannot be filtered.
